text: cng klaw theid wa (muhammad) wa chan mimi xanac thi ca khrxbkhrxng prayochn dı «læa thosʹ dı «wi pen krrmsiththi kætaw khxng chan di nxkcak sing thi xallxhˌ thrng prasngkh theanan læa hak chan pen phu thi ru sing renlab læw nænxn chan k yxm kxbkoy sing thi di wi makmay læw læa khwam chaw ray k yxm mi txng chan di chan mi chı khır xun nxkcak phu takteuxn læa phu prakas khawdi kæ klum chn thi sraththa theanan
